name: Wordy World
description:
This game is unfinished

You have to put in commands to make actions in the game, 

for now all you can do is walk around, and look at a hunky orc (you're welcome)

Here are the commands  you can use in the game

RUN [MOVE DIRECTION] [TIME OR DISTANCE]

WALK [MOVE DIRECTION] [TIME OR DISTANCE]

MOVE [MOVE DIRECTION] [TIME OR DISTANCE]

TURN [ROTATE DIRECTION] [TIME OR DEGREES]

ROTATE [ROTATE DIRECTION] [TIME OR DEGREES]

GREET [TONE] [STYLE]

MOVE DIRECTIONS : FORWARD, BACK, LEFT, RIGHT

ROTATE DIRECTIONS : LEFT, RIGHT, CLOCKWISE, COUNTER-CLOCKWISE

TIME: 1S, 4S, 10S ...

DISTANCE : 1M, 4M, 10M...

DEGREES: 1D, 4D, 10D...

TONES: ANGRY, COOL, CALM, SASSY, SARCASTIC, RUDE

STYLES: WHISPER, YELL
